text:
A failure to widely share the #COVID19 #vaccine with poor nations on an as-needs basis is not only selfish & inhumane, costing countless lives, it is stupid & will inflict unnecessary economic damage on wealthy countries.
#CovidVaccine #NoProfitOnPandemic
https://t.co/kePqYyVy3q https://t.co/egzv0USsmy
